Description:
The post holder will be responsible for tyre related services including tyre inspection, replacement, alignment and balancing for a wide range of vehicles. The role may be based in a workshop or outdoors on a mobile service vehicle. Experience and knowledge of tyres for passenger cars, light commercial vehicles and heavy goods vehicles is required. Awareness of industrial and off the road tyres will be an advantage.Key Responsibilities Include:Tyre replacement, balancing and repair.
Tyre inspection and performance evaluation.
Vehicle axle inspection and alignment.
Operation of mobile workshop and service vehicle.
